The serotype identifies HLA-B*4101, *4102, *4103 gene products. (For terminology help see: HLA-serotype tutorial) ==Serotype== {| border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center" style="text- align:center; background:#ffffff; margin-right: 1em; border:2px #e0e0ff solid;" |+ B41 serotype recognition of Some HLA B*41 allele-group gene productsderived from IMGT/HLA |- style="background:#f0f0ff" | style="width:60px" | B*41 || style="width:60px" | B41 | style="width:60px" | || style="width:60px" | Sample |- style="background:#f0f0ff" | allele || % || % || size (N) |- | style = "background:#e8e8f8" | 4101 || 87 || || 543 |- | style = "background:#e8e8f8" | 4102 || 87 || || 478 |- | style = "background:#e8e8f8" | 4103 || 91 || || 11 |} ==Allele frequencies== {|border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" align="right" style="text- align:center;
